Playground

Sandbox for testing and debugging various things. Currently it:

  • Listens to the cloned.stickyTableHeaders event
  • Demonstrates an issue with IE11 where the width is slightly off if the table has borders and does not have a width.
  • Shows an issue with using the <caption> tag.
